sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import './WeatherDisplay.css'; function WeatherDisplay({ weatherData, city }) { const { list } = weatherData; const currentWeather = list[0]; const currentDate = new Date(currentWeather.dt_txt); const isNight = currentDate.getHours() >= 18 || currentDate.getHours() < 6; return (

{currentDate.toLocaleDateString('en-US', { weekday: 'long', day: 'numeric' })}

{city}

{currentWeather.main.temp}°C

{list.slice(0, 8).map((item, index) => (

{new Date(item.dt_txt).toLocaleTimeString([], { hour: '2-digit', minute: '2-digit' })}

{item.main.temp}°C

))}

Humidity

{currentWeather.main.humidity}%

Wind

{currentWeather.wind.speed} m/s

Air Pressure

{currentWeather.main.pressure} hPa

UV

3

{list.filter((item, index) => index % 8 === 0).map((item, index) => (

{new Date(item.dt_txt).toLocaleDateString('en-US', { weekday: 'long', day: 'numeric' })}

{item.main.temp}°C

))}
); } export default WeatherDisplay;
